title: Baywatch motion poster: Priyanka, Dwayne and Zac raise hotness meter
text:
Baywatch motion poster: Priyanka, Dwayne and Zac raise hotness meter Baywatch motion poster: Priyanka, Dwayne and Zac raise hotness meter Currently reading: Baywatch motion poster: Priyanka, Dwayne and Zac raise hotness meter #Priyanka Chopra , #Baywatch   15 Feb 2017, 19:01:12] Our Desi girl Priyanka Chopra is creating buzz across Hollywood. PeeCee not only stars in American TV show Quantico but she is also ready to make her Hollywood debut with ‚ÄúBaywatch‚Äù. 
And now, the filmmakers have released a special motion poster where the entire cast is dressed in red swimwear, and we must say they all look incredibly sexy and gorgeous especially Priyanka, Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron. 
Priyanka is seen wearing a tube neck red gown and she totally rocks the outfit. The ‚ÄúMary Kom‚Äù actress took to Twitter to share Baywatch‚Äôs motion poster. The caption read, ‚ÄúSaving people from a lonely #ValentinesDay one kiss at a time. #Baewatch #VictoriaLeeds‚Äù Saving people from a lonely #ValentinesDay one kiss at a time. #Baewatch üíã #VictoriaLeeds pic.twitter.com/h9aFHrDCaQ ‚Äî PRIYANKA (@priyankachopra) February 14, 2017 
The 34 year-old actress will portray the role of a villain named Victoria Leeds in ‚ÄúBaywatch‚Äù. 
The film is a reboot of 90s TV show and is an action-comedy of the same name where Johnson and Efron work together to save the life guarding brand and team up to solve a murder at the beach. 
Baywatch is slated to hit the cinemas on May 26. X
